summary:
This Mod adds the items and magic and some followers of seven

descriptionHtml:
This MOD will add the magic and follower of some

This Mod is Standalone
Women immortality attribute & All Marriageable
I created this in ECE MOD

They are the pupils of greybeard
Instruction of Angeir, girls look for Dragon Bone
To protect the city in skyrim, she're waiting for players
To serve the player perhaps
She're mastered the magic forbidden
And I am carrying around spellbook forbidden

The three persons of Noa and Maria and Erica,
Girls, is the soul in half by Dragon voice
The soul can be called by Magika


Followers name Anna
Class Fighter
*location is MarkarhunderStonekeep
:naturally a bit spacy personality
:Bodysize=SeveNBaseOriginal

Class Mage
:She has a court magician together with Farengar in Dragons Reach
:location is WinterholdJarlsLonghouse
:Serious personality

Class Summoner
:location is WhiterunTempleofKynareth
:Personality Maidens

Followers name Sfoie
Class Archer

Twin sister

Twin sister
